attributes.action: Protest against Regiments being dispanded and more M.O.D cuts
attributes.additional_details:
OBJECTIVE - To get a u-turn on the defence cuts that will ultimately affect us all.
FACT - Collectively, with the cuts, the entire population of the British Army would not fill Wembley Stadium - put like that its a scary thought.
OLYMPICS - Cost over £7 billion - how can we justify this? An event which will last a few weeks and to which the armed forces have been drafted in to ensure better security and to protect against the threat of terrorists - how ironic!
